metadata.title: CVE-2023-38409 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in set_con2fb_map indrivers/video/fbdev/core/fbcon.c in the Linux kernel before 6.2.12. Becausean assignment occurs only for the first vc, the fbcon_registered_fb andfbcon_display arrays can be desynchronized in fbcon_mode_deleted (thecon2fb_map points at the old fb_info).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38409` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.3.0-7-generic - 6.3.0-7.7
linux-image-6.3.0-7-generic-lpae - 6.3.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-generic - 6.3.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-generic-64k - 6.3.0-7.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1005-aws - 6.5.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1004-azure - 6.5.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1004-gcp - 6.5.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-lowlatency - 6.3.0-7.7.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-lowlatency-64k - 6.3.0-7.7.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1005-oracle - 6.5.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1002-raspi - 6.5.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1002-starfive - 6.5.0-1002.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1003-laptop - 6.5.0-1003.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.3.0-7.7').
linux-aws package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1005.5').

linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was pending').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.3.0-7.7.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1005.5').
